DOCNAME: GUSAR v. THE REPUBLIC OF MOLDOVA AND ROMANIA
JUDGES: Alvina Gyulumyan;Ján Šikuta;Johannes Silvis;Josep Casadevall;Kristina Pardalos;Nona Tsotsoria
TEXT: CARDINAL . NORP The applicant , PERSON , is a NORP national , who was born in DATE and lives in GPE , GPE . She was represented before the ORG by PERSON , a lawyer practising in GPE .
ORG and Others v. GPE and GPE ( [ ORG ] , no . CARDINAL , ORG CARDINAL ) , may be summarised as follows .
CARDINAL . NORP The applicant is the widow of PERSON , a military official of the break - away “ GPE ( the “ FAC ) who was killed on DATE , during the military conflict in the FAC .

CARDINAL . NORP In a judgment of DATE the “ ORG of GPE found the CARDINAL applicants in ORG and Others ( cited above ) guilty , inter alia , of killing PERSON and another high ranking ORG official and sentenced them to sentences varying DATE imprisonment and death penalty , PERSON being the one sentenced to death .
CARDINAL . The subsequent events were summarised as follows in GPE and others :
“ QUANTITY . NORP On DATE the President of GPE declared that the applicants’ conviction was unlawful , on the ground that it had been pronounced by an unconstitutional court .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG examined of its own motion the judgment of DATE of the “ ORG of the FAC ” , quashed it on the ground that the court which had rendered it was unconstitutional , and ordered the file to be referred to the NORP public prosecutor for a new investigation in accordance with LAW . It appears from the written depositions , the information supplied by ORG and the evidence given by the witnesses heard by the ORG in PERSON in DATE , that the investigation ordered in the judgment of DATE came to nothing ( see PERSON : PERSON , § CARDINAL ; and Mr PERSON , § CARDINAL ) .

CARDINAL . In addition , ORG set aside the warrant for the applicants’ detention , ordered their release and asked the public prosecutor to look into the possibility of prosecuting the judges of the “ so - called ” ORG of Transdniestria for deliberately rendering an illegal decision , an offence punishable under ORG CARDINAL to CARDINAL of LAW .
CARDINAL . The authorities of the “ FAC did not respond to the judgment of DATE .

CARDINAL . The NORP authorities had opened an investigation into the deaths of Mr PERSON and Mr PERSON in DATE and DATE respectively , but the public prosecution service suspended this on DATE , under LAW of LAW , in the absence of any cooperation from the NORP judicial and police authorities . The investigation was reopened on DATE . As a result , a number of requests for cooperation ( the transmission of documents ) were sent to ORG FAC ” , Mr PERSON . Not receiving any reply , the NORP public prosecution service once again suspended the investigation on DATE . Since then it has not been reopened .
CARDINAL . On DATE Mr PERSON was released ... ”
CARDINAL . The other CARDINAL applicants in GPE and others were released in DATE and DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant wrote to ORG of GPE requesting information concerning the progress of the investigation into the circumstances of her husband ’s death .
CARDINAL . In a reply dated DATE the applicant was informed that the investigation had been discontinued on DATE in view of restrictions of access to the territory of the FAC .
